user_query: I'm planning a trip to Australia and I want to explore different business industries in the country. Can you provide me with a list of activities related to farming? Additionally, I'm interested in reading some news articles from the NY Times Archive about the agriculture industry in Australia. Please fetch the articles from September 2018.

TaskList.description: Fetch a list of farming-related activities in Australia.
Query the NY Times Archive for articles related to the agriculture industry in Australia from September 2018.
